price: 201. Usun kaal (Qhuraan kinnuk) mayaaminan qansarissi ken hayta digaalá ubullu haanam fanah.
arabic: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yu'minūna bihi ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
